earnStarsPara.text: With our loyalty program you can earn stars or purchase them with the payment method of your choice and redeem them for incredible rewards. Accumulate stars month by month and join the leader board to participate for VIP benefits.

joinLoyaltyPara.text: To get started, join now. You can also join in the app to get access to the full range of Soins Karismä Rewards benefits.

earnStarPara.text: Accumulate stars easily using your account. Using the Soins Karismä Card you can accumulate double points.

getRewardPara.text: As you earn Stars, you can redeem them for Rewards—like free products, subscriptions, and more. Start redeeming with as little as 50 Stars!

endlessBenefitsPara.text: Joining Soins Karismä Loyalty program means unlocking our card and access to exclusive benefits. Depending on your subscription, you will earn stars every time you reload your card.

uniqueRewardPara.text: Accumulate stars and redeem for an endless list of rewards: Academy, add-ons and more.

preloadCardPara.text: To earn Stars twice as fast, add money to your digital card using any payment option.

shareWinPara.text: Share the initiative with your friends, refer our subscriptions and double your stars faster.

loyaltyProgram.text: of the loyalty program here. Or if you have any questions, send us an email to info@soinskarisma.com

100.title: FREE SOINS KARISMÄ PRODUCTS
100.description: Take home your favorite products and include them in your self-care routine. You may claim two individual products or a complete collection.

500.title: SOINS KARISMÄ ACADEMY
500.description: Enjoy a free month of our academy, learn new beauty techniques and interact with the best beauty and wellness instructors.

1000.title: UNLIMITED BEAUTY
1000.description: Enjoy a free month of our Unlimited Beauty Subscription, or redeem your two favorite add-ons available for this subscription.

2000.title: UNLIMITED WELLNESS
2000.description: Enjoy a free month of our Unlimited Wellness Subscription, or redeem your two favorite add-ons available for this subscription.

5000.title: UNLIMITED SELF-CARE
5000.description: Enjoy a free month of our Unlimited Self-care Subscription, or redeem your two favorite add-ons available for this subscription.
